meta.title: Baum Studios
meta.description: Baum Studios is a spatial practice founded by Sara Blekić focusing on architecture and urbanism. The studio collaborates with a variety of spatial and non-spatial practitioners, engaging in projects across multiple scales.
meta.keywords: architect, urbanist, architecture, urbanism, spatial design, spatial practice, Sara Blekić, Zagreb, Croatia

site.brandText: Baum Studios is a spatial practice—founded in Zagreb (2023)(HR) by Sara Blekić. The studio collaborates with a variety of spatial and non-spatial practitioners, engaging in projects across multiple scales.
